description: Enterprise techniques used by IMAPLoader, ATT&CK software S1152 (v1.0)
name: IMAPLoader (S1152)

techniques.comment: [IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) uses the IMAP email protocol for command and control purposes.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)
[IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) modifies Windows tasks on the victim machine to reference a retrieved PE file through a path modification.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

[IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) hides the Windows Console window created by its execution by directly importing the `kernel32.dll` and `user32.dll` libraries `GetConsoleWindow` and `ShowWindow` APIs.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)
[IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) is executed via the AppDomainManager injection technique.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)
[IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) is a loader used to retrieve follow-on payload encoded in email messages for execution on victim systems.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)
[IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) imports native Windows APIs such as `GetConsoleWindow` and `ShowWindow`.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)
[IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) creates scheduled tasks for persistence based on the operating system version of the victim machine.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)
[IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) uses WMI queries to gather information about the victim machine.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)
[IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) uses WMI queries to query system information on victim hosts.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)
